channel.title: about on Dmitry Saveliev

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, my name is Dmitry Saveliev and I am a humble backend developer with years of some experience with Go and Ruby, living in Berlin. Open source enthusiast, born again Linux user, lifelong learner. I am mostly interested in distributed systems, functional programming, DevOps, doing experiments with and repairing my Arch. Also, I speak at meetups from time to time. Currently, I work for Thirdhash company, building the amazing decentralized payment system Unit-e.
